name: Falling Pixel Dash
description:
Falling Pixel Dash is a super fast arcade to test your reaction speed.

Dash your pixel from left to right, avoid obstacles, earn coins and try to improve your best time. Take gold while your pixel is falling and unlock new pixels.

Features:

  • Fast and addictive gameplay
  • 8 unlockable characters
  • Challenging procedurally generated levels

So what are you waiting for? Falling has never been so fun!

This game was made during One Hour Game Jam and improved latter.
